entry.title: shikha04-glitch/Shikha_CSE3_InStock: InStock is a lightweight and efficient web-based inventory management application designed for small and medium businesses, retail stores, supermarkets, and local vendors. This system helps users track inventory in real-time, manage stock levels, and receive low-stock alerts to avoid shortages or overstocking.
entry.content: InStock is a lightweight and efficient web-based inventory management application designed for small and medium businesses, retail stores, supermarkets, and local vendors. This system helps users track inventory in real-time, manage stock levels, and receive low-stock alerts to avoid shortages or overstocking.

entry.title: swastikroyyy/react-crop-image: A lightweight, customizable React component for cropping images with drag, resize, and keyboard support. Supports exporting cropped images as **Base64**, **Blob**, or **File** ‚Äî with options for **square** or **circle** crop boxes.

entry.title: R3v180/LoyalPyME: Open Source digital loyalty program and lightweight CRM platform for PyMEs/SMEs. Features points, tiers, rewards, QR validation, and customer management. Built with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.

entry.title: kunalcoder45/Cravid_web: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and share them with others.
entry.content: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and share them with others.
